title: 歡迎參加113學年度校園防災虛擬(VR)體驗活動Disaster Prevention VR Experience Activities for the 113th Academic Year
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 黃勇程 - victor0903@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6225
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 歡迎參加113學年度校園防災虛擬(VR)體驗活動Disaster Prevention VR Experience Activities for the 113th Academic Year
日期： Mon, 18 Nov 2024 16:54:38 +0800

一、	活動日期：113年11月22日下午14~16時
二、	活動地點：學活動園區前
三、	活動目的
為提升校內師生防災應變能力，使在災害發生的第一時間，免除恐慌並具備「自救」的能力；故特申請花蓮縣消防局VR體驗車，透過與VR車的互動方式，了解如何應變及提前防範，縮短驚慌及反應時間，以達精進校園安全之目的。
四、	報名網頁
https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/XSL_ApplyRWD/ActAnnounce.aspx?ActID=22714
活動人數有限，請大家儘早報名(本活動以教職員工為優先，若有缺額依報名順序遞補)。
1. Event date: November 22, 2024 from 14:00 to 16:00
2. Activity location: The open space between the student activity center and the library
3. Purpose of the activity
In order to improve the disaster prevention and response capabilities of teachers and students in the school, so that they can avoid panic and have the ability to "self-rescue" when a disaster occurs; therefore, we specially applied for the Hualien County Fire Department VR experience vehicle to learn more about it through interaction with the VR vehicle. How to respond and take precautions in advance, shorten panic and reaction time, and achieve the purpose of improving campus safety.
4. Registration web page
https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/XSL_ApplyRWD/ActAnnounce.aspx?ActID=22714
The number of participants for the event is limited, so please register as early as possible (this event gives priority to faculty and staff, if there are any vacancies, they will be filled in the order of registration).
